mapper.select: select count(*) from dormi_zone join stu_dormitory on stu_dormitory.zone_id=dormi_zone.id join student on stu_dormitory.stu_id=student.id where student.`name` like concat('%',#{0},'%') or dormi_zone.`zone_name` like concat('%',#{0},'%')

select student.`name` as student_name,student.id as student_id,dormi_zone.id as zone_id,dormi_zone.zone_name,stu_dormitory.building,stu_dormitory.room from dormi_zone join stu_dormitory on stu_dormitory.zone_id=dormi_zone.id join student on stu_dormitory.stu_id=student.id where student.`name` like concat('%',#{0},'%') or dormi_zone.`zone_name` like concat('%',#{0},'%')
